start.Name: Seeker
start.Text: (into recorder) Contract ID 734-B. Target: One ghost. Timer: 10 minutes. Rumors say the house gets... weird after that.

1.Name: Seeker
1.Text: Get in. Tag the ghost. Get out. Easy money. Unless the house eats me. Ha. Just kidding. Mostly.

2.Name: Ghost
2.Text: Okay okay okay—ten minutes. I just have to stay hidden for ten minutes. No pressure.

3.Name: Ghost
3.Text: Hey House, remember our deal? No sudden wall shifting, no trap tantrums, and *definitely* no hallway illusions.

4.Name: Ghost
4.Text: (whispers) I cut one wrong wire and now I’m the one getting hunted? Rude.
